title: Switch Expression with yield
description:
Write a program that takes a score (0-10) using `Scanner`.
Use a switch expression to determine the result:
- 10 -> Print `Perfect!` and yield `A`
- 9 -> `A`
- 8 -> `B`
- 7 -> `C`
- 6 -> `D`
- default -> `F`

Print the final grade.
